app_descript:
Beatstar - Touch Your Music

Brief:

Join the rhythm revolution with Beatstar, a unique music game where you tap, swipe, and feel the pulse of the beats to become a master of rhythm. Enjoy an ever-growing playlist of songs from your favorite artists and rise to the challenge of hitting every note perfectly to unlock new musical experiences. Whether you're a rhythm game veteran or new to the genre, Beatstar invites you to a new level of engagement with music you love.
